title: Elephant theatre (K)
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Sabrina Schmid
brief_description: One man has built a little theatre which he can hold in the palm of his hand. It reveals a world of its own. Yet there remains one dream to be fulfilled: that some elephants will come to live in it.
creator_credit_for_label: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Sabrina Schmid
